document.full_text: u.s. citizens may be at risk from radioactive waste stored near nuclear plants as better training for federal safety inspectors and more on-site checks are needed, an internal government report showed on friday.
document.title: u.s. needs more training for nuclear inspectors: nrc
lines_and_colors: u.s. citizens may be at risk from radioactive waste stored near nuclear plants as better training for federal safety inspectors and more on-site checks are needed, an internal government report showed on friday.
